pyscicat.client.ScicatClient¶

class pyscicat.client.ScicatClient(base_url: Optional[str] = None, token: str = False, username: Optional[str] = None, password: Optional[str] = None, timeout_seconds: Optional[int] = None)[source]¶

Responsible for communicating with the Scicat Catamel server via http

__init__(base_url: Optional[str] = None, token: str = False, username: Optional[str] = None, password: Optional[str] = None, timeout_seconds: Optional[int] = None)[source]¶

Initialize a new instance. This method attempts to create a tokenad_a from the provided username and password

Parameters
base_urlstr

Base url. e.g. http://localhost:3000/api/v3

usernamestr

username to login with

passwordstr

password to login with

timeout_seconds[int], optional

timeout in seconds to wait for http connections to return, by default None

Methods

__init__([base_url, token, username, ...])

Initialize a new instance.

get_datasets([filter_fields])

Gets datasets using the simple fiter mechanism.

get_datasets_full_query([skip, limit, ...])

Gets datasets using the fullQuery mechanism of SciCat.

upload_attachment(attachment[, datasetType])

Upload an Attachment.

upload_datablock(datablock[, datasetType])

Upload a Datablock

upload_dataset(dataset)

Upload a raw or derived dataset (method is autosensing)

upload_derived_dataset(dataset)

Upload a derived dataset

upload_raw_dataset(dataset)

Upload a raw dataset
